quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Series
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, potions, weasley. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Was Grindelwald defeated by Dumbledore in the Harry Potter series?
What is the name of Luna Lovegoods father in the Harry Potter books?
Emma Watson plays Hermione Granger in the Harry Potter film series.
Does Harry Potter have a tattoo on his chest?
In the Disney movie, The Beauty and the Beast, all of the residents of the Beasts castle were mystical creatures.
What are Voldemorts followers called in the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Death Eaters

questions.question: Does Voldemort have a rat named Nagini?
Which of these Harry Potter characters is not a member of the D.A.?
In the Harry Potter series, Rons uncle Billius saw a grim and died 25 hours later.
Harry Potter marries Hermione.
Hermiones cats name is Crookshanks.
Professor Snape is the Potions Master in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
Ginny died in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.
Who owned Scabbers before Ron Weasley?
Which of the following is not a name for Voldemort, the chief antagonist of the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dark Master

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Potion and Harry Potter
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, actor, j.k.. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What potion is used to help treat colds in the Harry Potter books?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pepperup Potion

questions.question: This potion from the Harry Potter books induces a deep dreamless sleep in the drinker.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sleeping Draught

questions.question: Name the first actor who played Professor Dumbledore in the Harry Potter film series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Harris

questions.question: In the Harry Potter books, this potion causes the drinker to become infatuated or obsessed with the one who gave it to them.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love Potion

questions.question: This potion, mentioned in the Harry Potter books, allows the drinker to assume the appearance of another person.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Polyjuice Potion

questions.question: What potion in the Harry Potter series helps stop bleeding and heal wounds?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Essence of Dittany

questions.question: What actor is not correctly paired with the character they played in the Harry Potter films?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jason Isaacs - Lord Voldemort

questions.question: This potion is described by J.K. Rowling as so powerful that three drops would have you spilling your innermost secrets for the entire class to hear.
What potion relieves the symptoms of lycanthropy in the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wolfsbane Potion

questions.question: Which potion in the Harry Potter series increases the luck of the drinker?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Felix Felicis

questions.question: What English actor portrays Harry Potters best friend, Ron Weasley?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rupert Grint

questions.question: Which potion, introduced in Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone, lengthens the lifespan of the drinker as long as they keep drinking it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elixir of Life

questions.question: What Gryffindor House ghost does John Cleese play in the Harry Potter film series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nearly Headless Nick

questions.question: Who portrays Draco Malfoy, one of the antagonists in the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Felton

questions.question: What member of the Order of the Phoenix is portrayed by actor Robbie Coltrane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rubeus Hagrid

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Task
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, maze, gables. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which Death Eater bit Lupin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fenrir Greyback

questions.question: Fictional character Severus Snape was a Death Eater when he died.
In what year was the novel Anne of Green Gables published?
Which Death Eater killed Fred Weasley in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: unknown by exact text

questions.question: Harry Potter wins 10,000 galleons for winning the Triwizard Tournament.
What is the name of the fourth champion of the fictional Triwizard Tournament?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry Potter

questions.question: What is the name of the chapter in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire in which Cedric Diggory dies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flesh, Blood, and Bone

questions.question: Does Harry Potter fight a dementor in the maze in the third task of the Triwizard Tournament?
What is the name of the dragon Viktor Krum has to fight for the first task of the Triwizard Tournament?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chinese Fireball

questions.question: What is the answer to the riddle the sphinx gives to Harry Potter in the maze for the third task of of the Triwizard Tournament?
What does Harry Potter do to be able to breathe underwater for the second task of the Triwizard Tournament?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: eats gillyweed

questions.question: What potion from the Harry Potter books causes the drinker to become older?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aging Potion

questions.question: Where is Harry Potter when he finds out what the second task of the Triwizard Tournament is about?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: prefects bathroom

questions.question: What was the location of the orphanage from which Anne was adopted in the book Anne of Green Gables?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nova Scotia

questions.question: Fictional character Augustus Rookwood worked in the Department of Mysteries.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Anne and Book
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, marilla, diana. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Diana Barry is Annes best friend in the book Anne of Green Gables. How did Anne describe their friendship?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bosom friends

questions.question: Early in the story of Anne of Green Gables, Marilla proudly presents Anne with three new dresses which she has made to replace the shabby, orphanage issued clothes but is very annoyed when it becomes obvious that Anne doesnt like them. Why doesnt Anne like them?

options.text: They dont have any lace trimming.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They dont have puffed sleeves.

questions.question: In what Canadian province do Marilla and Matthew Cuthbert live in the book Anne of Green Gables?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prince Edward Island

questions.question: In the book Anne of Green Gables Anne gets herself into many predicaments.  Which of the following is NOT one of them?

options.text: She mistook a bottle of currant wine for the raspberry cordial she was supposed to serve for tea and got drunk.
She forgot to replace the cheesecloth cover on the pudding sauce and a mouse drowned in it.
She bought hair dye from a peddler and instead of the desired black, it turned her hair green.
She broke her slate over a schoolmates head when he teasingly called her carrots.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She mistook a bottle of currant wine for the raspberry cordial she was supposed to serve for tea and got drunk.

questions.question: Which one of these numbers does not fit in the sequence: 2 4 6 7 9 12 11?
Which of the following is Annes surname in the book Anne of Green Gables?
What is the name of the theater in which Anne of Green Gables - The Musical plays every summer?

options.text: The Green Gables Theater of the Arts
The Centennial Theater of the Arts
The Confederation Center of the Arts

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Confederation Center of the Arts

questions.question: At the end of the novel Anne of Green Gables, Matthew Cuthbert dies from complications related to pneumonia.
What is the name of the fictional town in which the story of Anne of Green Gables unfolds?
How many books are there in the L. M. Montgomery Anne series?
Sam had $3.00, Bob had $9.50, Joe had $5.25, and Jim had $7.25. How much is all of their money together worth?
What adjective best describes the character of Mrs. Rachel Lynde from the book Anne of Green Gables?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: When was Anne of Green Gables - The Musical performed for the first time?
What was the relationship between Matthew and Marilla, the couple who adopted Anne in Lucy Montgomerys book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brother and Sister

questions.question: This Emmy Award-winning actress played Marilla in the 1985 television production of Anne of Green Gables, written and directed by Kevin Sullivan.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colleen Dewhurst

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Horcrux and Harry Potter
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, hermione, cats. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How old was Charlotte, the protagonist of The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle, when she took the trip from England to her home on Rhode Island?
How many Horcruxes did Tom Riddle make?
According to the Harry Potter series of books, any object can be a Horcrux.
Do all of these numbers fit the sequence: 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 9?
Nagini, one of Voldemorts Horcruxes, is a snake.
If one of Voldemorts Horcruxes is destroyed, will he know?
A person owned 8 dogs and as many cats. What is the total amount of pets owned by that somebody?
One of the Horcruxes in the Harry Potter books is Ravenclaws cup.
Did Harry Potter destroy Tom Riddles diary in the second book because he knew it was a Horcrux?
What is the first Horcrux found in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The locket

questions.question: Which of the following numbers doesnt belong to the others: 3, 9, 15, 20?
How much is 765 divided by 10?
What do you get when you divide 123 by 10?
What did Ron and Hermione use to destroy Hufflepuffs cup?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Basilisk Fangs

questions.question: There are three digits in this number. The first digit (of the hundreds) is 8. Divide it by two, that is your second digit, divide the result again by two, that is your third digit. What is the number?

quizzes.title: Nature Quiz: Book and True Confessions
quizzes.description: Test your nature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Nature, ship, hans. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Captain in the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle dies.
Zachariah, a character from the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle, is brutally beaten to death by the Captain and Mr. Hollybrass.
Charlotte was the only female on the ship in the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle.
What happens to the pea after the prince marries the princess in the fairy tale The Princess and the Pea?

options.text: They put it in the Royal Museum
They split it and eat it
An anger takes it to Heaven

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They put it in the Royal Museum

questions.question: In the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle, the crew wanted to get revenge on the Captain.
Who does the Captain blame for the murder of Mr. Hollybrass in the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle?
What is the word that Kai has to spell using pieces of ice in order to regain his freedom in Andersens fairy tale The Snow Queen?
What new name is Thumbelina given at the end of the fairy tale Thumbelina?
What is the meaning of a falling star according to the late grandmother in Andersens The Little Match Girl?

options.text: An angel is coming to earth from Heaven

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Someone is dying

questions.question: What is Elisa forbidden to do until she finishes knitting the eleven nettle shirts in Hans Christian Andersens fairy tale The Wild Swans?
What does the Sea Witch want from the Little Mermaid in exchange for the magic potion in Andersens fairy tale The Little Mermaid?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her tongue/voice

questions.question: According to the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle, what is the penalty for murder of a ships First Mate?

options.text: getting locked in a room with the ships ghost

questions.question: What was the name of the ship that Charlotte boarded in the book The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Seahawk

questions.question: What animals mock the little duck in Hans Christian Andersens fairy tale The Ugly Duckling?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cat and hen

questions.question: In The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle, the men from the crew plan to kill Charlotte because she supported the Captain.
